titles.title: To authorize appropriations for a retirement incentive for certain employees of National Laboratories.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on National Security, and in addition to the Committee on Science, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Basic Research.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Procurement.

bill.summary: 2/9/1995--Introduced. Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of Energy for the California Public Employees Retirement System (CPERS) for an early retirement incentive established by the University of California that is: (1) commensurate with the program known as Voluntary Early Retirement Incentive III provided to members of the University of California Retirement Program; and (2) offered, during the 90-day period beginning on September 1, 1995, to individuals who are enrolled in CPERS and employed by the University in positions at the Los Alamos National Laboratory, Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory, or Lawrence Berkeley Laboratory that are paid for with Federal funds.
